name: Industrial Ashen
content:
Industrial Ashen

A vast industrial complex where the air is thick with ash and the sound of machinery never ceases. Primary Objectives are control nodes. Secondary markers are power conduits or maintenance access points. The ground is covered in a layer of industrial ash.


Terrain Features:

  • Control nodes
  • Power conduits
  • Maintenance access points
  • Industrial structures

Atmosphere:

The air is thick with ash and the constant hum of machinery. The ground is covered in a layer of industrial waste, and the sky is darkened by the constant output of the factories.
